revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Libre Computer |model=AML-S905X-CC |revision=-V2 (Sweet Potato) |upc=0647923366808 |asin=B0CHHJX44N |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Shenzhen Libre Technology |price=35 |est_release_date=09/2023 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=USB Female (Type-C) |cpu1_brand=Amlogic |cpu1_model=S905X |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25LQ128EWIG |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4A8G165WB-BCRC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=4 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL852G;;1; |flags=HDMI 2.0, I2C, SPI, GPIO, SPDIF, IR receiver, ADC header, I2S, Micro SD Card slot, eMMC module socket |stock_boot=U-Boot;23.07+; |stock_os=Linux;6.1.54-10001;Debian 12; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=root }} {{TagLine|Single-board Computer}} :[https://hub.libre.computer/t/2023-09-01-libre-computer-aml-s905x-cc-v2-sweet-potato-now-available/2831 Product page] ''"Libre Computer Board
AML-S905X-CC-V2.0-C"'' is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Amlogic|List of Single-board computers}} ===Links=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2023/09/08/libre-computer-aml-s905x-cc-v2-sbc-directly-installs-linux-images-from-the-internet/ ''Libre Computer AML-S905X-CC-V2 SBC'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/libre-computer-showcases-low-cost-sbc-with-poe-support/ ''Libre Computer showcases low-cost SBC with PoE support'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Amlogic]]'' S905X Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.5GHz *GPU: ''Mali-450'' @750MHz (OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG 1.1) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 16MB (SPI NOR) Flash, eMMC module socket, :TF card (128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 2GB (DDR4) SDRAM ([[Samsung]]) *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet port *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports, 1x USB 2.0 header *Power: 5V/3A via USB Type-C, PoE header ===Models=== *[[Libre Computer La Frite (1GB)]] (AML-S805X-AC) • 1GB/2GB • [[Amlogic]] S805X *[[Libre Computer Le Potato]] (2GB) (AML-S905X-CC) • 2GB, 64-bit, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Renegade (1GB)]] (ROC-RK3328-CC) • 1GB/2GB, GbE, USB 3.0 *[[Libre Computer Sweet Potato]] (2GB) (AML-S905X-CC-V2)• 2GB, 64-bit, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Tritium (2GB)]] (ALL-H3-CC H5) • 512MB/1GB/2GB • [https://libre.computer/products/boards/all-h3-cc/ PPage] __NOTOC__
